page.title: 06Kirtlington School
page.content: Our educational aims are to :1) Help each child to feel secure and happy in school. 2) Ensure that all children are actively involved in their day at school. 3) Help develop the individual potential of each child, particularly in the areas of language, number, creative work and scientific enquiry. 4) Develop the social and moral potential of each child in a caring community. 5) Help each child to understand the religious dimension in his life with explicit reference to the bible. 6) Help each child to develop independence and self-reliance, and so increase in confidence. 7) Work for a partnership between home and school in caring for the child. 8) Provide an attractive, stimulating environment in and around the school building. 9) To involve the village community in school life.
